channel.title: Question
channel.description:
How would I change my 15 rules,
1) No profain language 2) Respect ALL staff 3) No Duping, Hacking, Autoers, or any of the sort! 4) No changing any file of the client (except music folder) 5) If you don't like my server, don't ***** about it, leave 6) No Attacking "Mod SmitDog" or expect a deleted character/suspension/ban/ip ban/ip range ban 7) No Trading Mod SmitDog in game, Only I will trade you. 8) Be respectful to all players. No Bitching. 9) NO SPAMMING 10) No names that could be impersonating owner/smitdog or anyone for that matter 11) You must kill the monsters you summon! Only 3 summons at a time! 12) No 0 iteming while pking!!! 13) No attacking NPC's (shop merchants etc...) THIS IS AN INSTANT BAN!!! 14) Do Not beg for mod/admin 15) No attacking people with summons
Into something like this in game? [IMG]http://i142.photobucket.com/albums/r84/Smity9110/question.jpg[/img] Please help me.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Well, goodluck with the server. Just PM me if you need anything else.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @smitdog smitdog
item.description:
@smitdog wrote:

This is what I wrote

[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rules”))
{
sendQuest("@dre@LATEST RULEZ!!!", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Very Latest", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- 1) No profain language@dbl@", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- 2) Respect ALL staff@dbl@", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- 3) No Duping, Hacking, Autoers, or any of the sort!@dbl@", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- 4) No changing any file of the client except the music folder@dbl@", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- 5) If you don’t like my server, don’t bitch about it, leave!@dbl@", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- 6) No Attacking Mod SmitDog or expect a deleted character suspension, ban, ip ban, or ip range ban!@dbl@", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@----------------------------@dbl@", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@ @dbl@", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@- added white armour and changed some bonuses@dbl@", 8155);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

			}[/code]

Please note some of the coding was pushed over in the post.
It doesn’t overide the ::lupdate command though, and I did compile. I’m confused. Thanks for helping my nooby self.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“smitdog, post:3, topic:70914”]I’m still confused

P.S. I need a nooby friendly guide please. :)[/quote]
Open client.java up, and search for the text you see on your screen; it should then bring you to a group of code. I don’t know the method offhand but what you see will be inside of “”, change it to your discretion and copy the entire line and add whatever you need to.

Read full topic

It will be in client.java, you search the red text in there and replace with your rules

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @smitdog smitdog
item.description:
@smitdog wrote:

How would I change my 15 rules,

1) No profain language

  1. Respect ALL staff

  2. No Duping, Hacking, Autoers, or any of the sort!

  3. No changing any file of the client (except music folder)

  4. If you don’t like my server, don’t ***** about it, leave

  5. No Attacking “Mod SmitDog” or expect a deleted character/suspension/ban/ip ban/ip range ban

  6. No Trading Mod SmitDog in game, Only I will trade you.

  7. Be respectful to all players. No Bitching.

  8. NO SPAMMING

  9. No names that could be impersonating owner/smitdog or anyone for that matter

  10. You must kill the monsters you summon! Only 3 summons at a time!

  11. No 0 iteming while pking!!!

  12. No attacking NPC’s (shop merchants etc…) THIS IS AN INSTANT BAN!!!

  13. Do Not beg for mod/admin

  14. No attacking people with summons


Into something like this in game?
question.jpg769×552

Please help me.

Read full topic
